mapper.select: select id as id, userName as username,password as password from t_user where userName = #{username}
select r.roleNo from t_user u,t_role r where u.roleId = r.id and u.userName= #{username}
select p.permitNo from t_user u,t_role r,t_permission p,t_role_permit rp where u.roleId=r.id and rp.roleId=r.id and rp.permissionId=p.id and p.permitNo IS NOT NULL and u.userName=#{username}
select u.id as id,u.userName as username,r.roleName as rolename from t_user u,t_role r where u.roleId=r.id
select id as id, userName as username from t_user where id=#{id}
